# THIS FILE HAS BEEN GENERATED BY THE BUILD CONFIGURATION SYSTEM - DO NOT EDIT

set(MINECPP_NETWORK_DIR ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR})

add_library(minecpp_network STATIC)

# Public include headers
target_include_directories(minecpp_network
  PUBLIC ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/include
  PRIVATE ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/include/minecpp/network
)

# Source subdirectory
add_subdirectory("src")

target_link_libraries(minecpp_network
        LINK_PUBLIC
        minecpp_world
        minecpp_container
        LINK_PRIVATE
        minecpp_container
        minecpp_nbt
        minecpp_game
        Boost::system
)

add_subdirectory("test")
